creditline: Gift of Fay M. Gallus and Richard M. Sweet
description: black and white image of a residental house and front yard; lawn chair and table on the right side of composition; in-ground pool on the left side of composition; mountain range in the background.
inscription: verso, LC in pencil: 8. \\ verso, BL corner in pencil: KP-E-28
markings: verso, LC stamp in red ink: PHOTOGRAPHY BY / JULIUS SHULMAN / 3950 WEST SIXTH ST. / LOS ANGELES 5, CALIF. \\ verso, LR corner stamp in black ink: RICHARD J. NEUTRA  / ARCHITECT & CONSULTANT / 2300 SILVERLAKE BLVD. / LOS ANGELES, CALIFORNIA
title: Residence of Warren Tremain, Montecito, CA (Richard Neutra architect)
